For those of you who don't know Spanish, the message title is Good News.

I have good news:

1)I have the radar function ported out into Jesse and it displays
thumbnail images of the maps. :-)) [Well, thumbnail isn't quite an
accurate term since the images are large, but they're smaller compared
to the html maps.]

There's bad news:

1)The scroll bars don't quite work right. :-((

2)I can't save the thumbnail image YET. :-((

3)it only works with map data. :-~ I haven't added the feature to put
markings where the items on the map are located.

I hope to fix bad news problem #2 before I hit the sack since it's a
high priority item.  As soon as I can save those images, expect a
message about a new version of Jesse being uploaded. :-))
